Room.Name: Park Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the northern face of cliffs in the Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: Below you is a narrow, sandy, sheltered beach area which is part of a wild- life preserve. Gulls and other seabirds wheel overhead, and there is one very strange bird which is much bigger than the others. The path continues in a northwest-southeast direction as it runs along the face of the cliff.
